subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks were led by Carmelo Anthony and J. R. Smith, with 20 points each, but had three other players score in double figures as they beat the 1-13 Wizards.
snippet: The Knicks were led by Carmelo Anthony and J. R. Smith, with 20 points each, but had three other players score in double figures as they beat the 1-13 Wizards.
